page.title: 07A Luxury Hotel-Dorking NE
page.content: The Burford Bridge Hotel is quietly set next to the{River Mole}at the foot of{Box Hill},20 miles from London. The gardens are beautiful.There is a 4 foot square chess board and a swimming pool. The hotel is very popular especially for weekend breaks,holidays and residential conferences.In the lounge there are comfortable armchairs,a full tea is served (it costs Â£7.50 each) and there is a cocktail bar. An old{Tithe Barn}is used for weddings,medieval banquets etc.{Lord {Nelson and Lady Hamilton}stayed there before the Battle of Trafalgar. The 50 guest bedrooms have private baths,TV,radio and telephone.It costs Â£60 a night for bed and breakfast,a {four day stay at Christmas costs Â£340 {for a family of four.
